alert.note: Alert for McLean (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:22PM CST until February 21 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills as low as 45 below zero expected. * WHERE...McLean County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM this evening to Noon CST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outdoor activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, covering exposed skin. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
